services.label: Data Strategy
services.title: Connect the dots between your business goals and the data that drives them
services.description: Data without direction is just noise. I'll work with your team to tie your metrics to real business outcomes, align stakeholders, and create a roadmap so your data drives action, not confusion.

testimonial.quote: Valerie has made a significant contribution to the Nuclear Skills Plan, supporting the translation of complex data into clear and actionable insights.
testimonial.name: Lawrence Poxon

services.label: Data Solutions
services.title: Get answers fast, and understand why they matter
services.description: Getting answers shouldn't slow your team down. I'll build data solutions, from dashboards to automated pipelines, that cut reporting time from days to minutes so everyone gets the insights they need to act.

testimonial.quote: Our organisation now benefits from a more robust and user-friendly reporting system in Tableau.
testimonial.name: John Wyldbore

services.label: Sustainable Delivery
services.title: Solutions your team can own long after I'm gone
services.description: I build with handover in mind from day one. Full documentation, clear logic, and a proper handover so you're never held hostage by knowledge that lives in one person's head.

testimonial.quote: Throughout our week working together, I learnt a significant amount from Valerie.
testimonial.name: Joseph Evans
